tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Found his balanced way of combining conventional approach and modern methods very interesting. His focussed and unhurried way in understanding the patient's particular problem and addressing it, offering solutions and sugfestions for treatment was totally heart warming. In short, a doctor 
who doesn't just listen, speak and let you leave but one who engages with  the patient's situation.  God bless.

tags: Wait time,
review:
Very poor time keeping. Appointment was at 8pm and doctor came in at 10pm one time. Second time 8.30pm appointment and doctor came in at 10pm again. And consultation happened at 10.30. 

Very difficult to plan the evening or dinner with this kind of poor time keeping.
